text: indrOq vai Si#thiqla iqvA&pra#tiShThita AsIqth sO&su#rEByO&biBEqth sa praqjApa#tiqmupA#&dhAvaqt tasmA# EqtaM pa#~jcadaSarAqtraM ~MvajraqM prAya#cCaqt tEnAsu#rAn parAqBAvya# viqjityaq Sriya#magacCadagniqShTutA# pAqpmAnaqM nira#dahata pa~jcadaSarAqtrENaujOq bala#mindriqyaM ~MvIqrya#mAqtmanna#dhattaq ya EqvaM ~MviqdvA(gm)sa#H pa~jcadaSarAqtramAsa#tEq BrAtRu#vyAnEqva pa#rAqBAvya# viqjityaq Sriya#M gacCantyagniqShTutA# pAqpmAnaqM ni - [  ] 16
